name: Fire Noodle Eating Champs
description:
FIRE NOODLE EATING CHAMPS!!! 

Who can eat the most fire noodles in 10 SECONDS?? Battle a friend and find out!

Made in a week for #gameaweek2023 (theme was 10 seconds or less).

CONTROLS: 

Player 1 - WASD 

Player 2 - Arrow keys

CREDITS:

Art + programming + music by wombok (@wombokgames)

whistle sfx by strongbot (freesound)
